verses.text: Jab'xonhej wal syal wik'an wik' swab'i. Vanxo sk'och in k 'inal t'a slajwub', wach'xo yaj wed'tal t'a campusante.
Ha heb' anima, oyanoch heb' in sb'uchani, masanil tiempo syak' kus in k'ol heb', maxtzac yal in colan in b'ha t'a heb'.
Palta Mamin colin, yujto malaj junocxo mach syak'och sb'a in scolani, a achnhej syal uuj.
Ha ach ix a k'ub'ejel jelanil t'a juntzanh heb' winh wamigo tik, manh in a cha ak'joc ganar yuj heb' winh.
Elokab'k'och icha syal jun ab'ix: Ha junok mach syixtej junok yamigo, haxo yuninal ol ab'an syail yuj jun tas sk'ulej chi'.
Ha ach ix ak' yal chuk heb' anima t'ayin, ix laj stzub'an in sat heb'.
Toxonhej k'ik'aminac wilan yuj in yaelal. Ichato manh chequeloc in niwanil tik, yujto ix in te b'akb'i.
Ayic syilan heb' anima wach' sb'eyb'al tas tzin ik'an tik, sat sk'ol heb', scot yowal heb', yujto chuk in snaan heb'.
Ha heb' wach' sb'eyb'al, wach'nhej ol elk'och heb'. Ha heb' malaj chukal sk'ulej, ol k'enhejchaanh heb'.
Palta cotanhec t'a tik ex wamigo. Malaj junok aj pensar tz'ilchaj wuj t'a he kal.
B'elb'on yek' in k 'inal, haxo tas nab'il wuuj, ma tas tzin nib'ej, toxo ix juwieli.
Ha ex tik a t'ak'walil tzeyaloch k'ualil, haxo yic k'ik'k 'inal, tzeyalani, lak'anxo ay sakil k'inal.
Toxonhej tzin tanhwej in chami, yic sk'och telan in niwanil sway t'a kal k’ik’ k’inal.
Ha nok' ha'ay yet' campusante swaloch in mam in nunoc yet' wanab'oc.
¿B'ajtil ay tas swak'och yipoc in k'ool? ¿Ay am mach ojtannac tas ol in ajoc?
¿Tom ol k'och jun chi' wed' t'a yet'tal heb' chamnac? ¿Tom ol kannhej wed' ta' t'a yol lum lum chi'? xchi winhaj Job chi'.
